system.description: Project astral body onto Astral Plane; body in suspended animation. Silver cord links astral to body; if broken you die. Can travel to other planes; form new body there. Companions linked in circle come with you. Lasts until you end it or dispel/cord broken/body destroyed.

components.materialDescription: Jacinth 1,000 gp plus silver bar 5 gp per person.

system.target: You plus one willing creature per 2 levels
